Role: Salesforce Developer

Salary: up to £70k

Location: Central London

Company:
This non-profit organisation work to support charities and other non-profit organisations to simplify their workload.

What are they looking for?

They are looking for developers that have :

  • Commercial experience working on a variety of projects using Apex, Visualforce and Lightning components.
  • Experience working with a mix of implementations e.g. Service cloud, Sales Cloud
  • Experience with OOP languages such as JAVA
  • Experience with workflows, reports, dashboards, triggers

Soft skills

  • Stakeholder management
  • Strong communication skills to translate technical terms to the business

Perks of working for this client:

This company are massively forward thinking when it comes to looking after their employees and this definitely makes them stand out from the crowd. This company is proud to support diversity in the workplace and they run a number of initiatives to foster inclusion and cooperation including networking events for female employees, family friendly benefits and an internal awards scheme in support of their values. They actively encourage all employees to work from home at least one day a week.

To find out more, get in touch today and apply!

For further details I can be contacted via:

Salary: Flexible on Experience

Location: Remote

An exciting and expamding End User urgently requires an experienced Netsuite Developer to come and join the team


Key skills

    • A uniquely balanced personality who is keenly analytical yet also highly social and empathetic.

    • An abstract, visionary thinker who can visualize complex problems and implement solutions.
    • Known for carefully considering the potential outcomes of even small changes, which can have a big impact in the IT world, before testing and implementing them.

items.title: Senior SAP Basis Consultant - Remote
items.content:
This position can be Remote.


GENERAL DESCRIPTION

Symmetry™ is a leading applications management and hybrid cloud hosting provider. An SAP partner since 2005, Symmetry is certified in SAP Hosting, Cloud and SAP HANA® Operations. As a true extension of each customer's IT team, Symmetry places a laser focus the end user experience and offers highly flexible, tailored solutions to meet the unique business needs of global enterprise clients.


POSITION

The Symmetry Senior Basis Administrator is part of a Symmetry Consulting Team, participating in delivering contracted services to a set of Clients. The Senior Basis Administrator performs system monitoring of Client systems, regular system maintenance (escalation level), mentors and coaches, and performs project work as needed.

DUTIES

· Provide maintenance, problem handling and report preparation activities for clients

· Perform root cause analysis for clients' problems and provide accurate documentation to client in a timely and effective manner

· Establish technical knowledge in three or more technical areas outside of SAP ERP products

· Provide recommendations and guidance for the tuning and optimization SAP landscape

· Lead project deliverables on schedule and accurately

· Actively participate in the knowledge transfer and sharing process with other consultants

· Successful creation of client landscapes, client copies, upgrades, patches and migrations

· Collaborate with technical sales

· Communicate any potential client issue to Delivery Manager if escalation is necessary

· Lead, coach and mentor, fellow Colleagues when problems arise

· Develop and maintain clear and concise documentation and presentations

· Keep informed of current and future Industry Trends






REQUIREMENTS / QUALIFICATIONS

· Bachelor's degree or 9+ years of IT industry experience

· 7+ years of related SAP Basis experience

· Strong technical aptitude

· Experience in managing SAP environment(s) changes, upgrades and migrations

· Excellent problem-solving ability

· Advanced Performance Tuning and Monitoring

· Demonstrated ability to understand and accomplish instructions communicated from the management level to colleague level

· Demonstrated customer service skills/professional attitude

· Strong organizational and interpersonal skills

· Ability to work independently and with a team

· Experience with project management as technical lead

· Demonstrated ability to author technical specifications, presentations and other documentation

· One or more technical specific SAP Certification

· Knowledge of more than one database environment

· Possess a strong desire to constantly improve and develop skillset

· Demonstrated value-added expertise in specialty areas of SAP technology (HANA, BW etc.)

items.content: Our North Atlanta client is seeking a Remote Salesforce Developer with specialization developing and deploying Salesforce apps. The role is part of the Platform Management & Innovation team, responsible for business ownership and flawless delivery of critical business systems (e.g., Salesforce, Encompass, others), new technologies, and data analytics projects that will help this mortgage company achieve long-term financial growth, expense control goals, and optimize the customer experience. Key goals are to experience savings through innovation and retiring of old technology, introducing automation and digitizing our lending workflow. Responsibilities: You will engage in full systems life cycle management (e.g., analysis, technical requirements, design, coding, testing, implementation) of systems and applications software to ensure delivery is on time and within budget. You will research and support the integration of emerging technologies and participate in component and data architecture design, technology planning, and testing for Applications Development initiatives to meet business requirements and ensure compliance. You will provide knowledge and support for application development, integration, and maintenance. You will work with business groups and technical teams to successfully design and manage solutions leveraging the full power of the Salesforce platform and integration with external systems. The Salesforce Applications Developer has experience designing and deploying solutions using Force.com, Salesforce.com CRM, and other Salesforce related technologies. Required Skills: Bachelor's Degree in a technical discipline or related job experience. SFDC Certified professionals experience a significant plus. 5+ years of software development experience with Salesforce.com (Apex, VisualForce, and Force.com applications). At least 5 full lifecycle implementation of Salesforce.com CRM with custom Force.com apps. At least 5 Sales Cloud and Service Cloud implementations platform that includes: Experience with the SFDC overall platform and all its modules and in Force.com designing technical solution architecture and integration. Experience in the architecture and design of 1 or more successful custom Salesforce.com solutions spanning multiple platforms, including integration, data migration, and authentication/Roles based access control. Deep understanding of APEX Classes, Lightning Components & Framework, Aura UI Framework, Triggers, Workflows, Validations. Deep understanding of Visual Force pages including HTML, JavaScript, & ExtJS Detailed knowledge of: SFDC CRM application (Sales and Service Cloud) capabilities and constraints, mobile and web technologies: Java, HTML5 and ESB Integration and Data services architecture and techniques: SOAP, REST, JSON * Detailed knowledge of Security, Sharing, Profiles, and Roles Strong expertise in at least three of the following areas is required: System Implementation, Change Enablement & User Adoption SalesForce Automation Service & Support Marketing Cloud Communities and Mobile Platform development Experience in cross-system data integration (mapping data from multiple sources to another). Ability to recommend and establish Salesforce best practices. Ability to operate effectively in a fast-paced deadline-driven environment Proven ability to prioritize and manage a substantial workload. Team player, self-starter, and motivated with the ability to multi-task while meeting deadlines. Excellent organizational, oral, written communication, and presentation skills with the ability to interact with technical and functional staff at all levels. Ability to work with business users to transform and develop requirements into design, implementation and business solutions. Preferred Skills: Experience working in a matrix organization structure. Experience in Financial Services, with an emphasis in mortgage banking/lending. Exposure to Business Process Re-engineering. About Stratfield Consulting We are very proud of the people that we invite into our firm and clients. Our people are: Experienced- smart problem solvers. Easy to work with- friendly, modest, and humble. Earnest & Engaged- we care enough to do the extra work to ensure your success. Full-time opportunity located in Atlanta. Our client is not able to offer relocation or visa sponsorships at this time. APPLY NOW! Please forward resume to: Talent Acquisition Specialist **Please, NO phone calls or third-party recruiting agency submittals or inquiries.

items.title: Freelance Salesforce Consultant (Remote)
items.content: Mission The mission for Salesforce consultants is to understand client strategy and capture business requirements on projects (guided by a partner if relevant for vertical), articulate and execute business requirements with help from other parts of the organization, and make sure they're executed competently. Keep the client happy, communicate progress and budget with Hunley partners to keep them up to date, and manage/advise need for resources Outcomes Understand client's business needs - be business analyst for each project Listen to client, articulate their needs, and understand their underlying needs even if they're different from the words they use Translate business needs into business requirements, process design, requirements definition Have clients comfortable with how the project is coming along - communication, no surprises Have Hunley partners comfortable with how the project is coming along - communication, no surprises Manage and/or execute on business analysis, process design, requirements definition, configuration/code, data migration, integrations, testing, training Manage and advise need for resources for projects, delegating where appropriate Run and complete profitable projects Get recommendations/referrals from clients Job Description - Saleforce Consultant The Hunley Group is a rapidly growing Salesforce Gold Cloud Alliance Partner based in Davidson, NC with an entirely virtual team spread across the country. We're an exciting, fast-moving consultancy that is customer-focused, highly collaborative, and values the contributions of our team. We have a reputation as both a great partner to our clients as well as a great place to work. We are seeking an experienced Salesforce consultant to support us in the execution of client projects. You should be extremely comfortable and confident in knocking out Salesforce implementations. We would expect you to be able to take point with clients, driving discovery and analysis, constructing a strategy and proposed architecture, guiding the project overall, and managing/completing the agreed upon configuration (no Apex - will support with coders as needed). You will probably work on multiple projects with different clients simultaneously. Responsibilities You will serve as the senior process, strategy, and architectural lead on client projects. We and your clients will lean on you to lead: Business analysis and discovery Process design Requirements definition, including writing org-level, complex implementation requirements that are easy for clients to understand and respond to Project management and coordination - managing the schedule, managing the client's PM as well as the internal team Instance configuration tasks Integrations Data migration and management Testing and UAT Training and launch You will lead project teams, managing more junior consultants as needed. You'll use Hunley processes and help us develop them further You will take the lead in managing the relationships with the client-side business leads You will champion quality on projects, and identify and mitigate risks You will manage budgets, ensuring that projects are within budget or getting client agreement to additional work Qualifications Minimum 5 years of experience functioning as a Salesforce consultant Salesforce Certifications & experience Required: Administrator and either Sales Cloud or Service Cloud Other Cloud certifications a plus Detailed knowledge of Salesforce architecture Understanding of data and ability to manage data quality tools You should have at least 6 new instance implementations under your belt, or a minimum of a dozen large-scale projects in existing instances. Your role should have been as the primary driver for many of these. Bachelors degree required; MBA is a plus Required Skills: Good communication skills; able to speak to business users in "layman's language" Critical thinker - spots gaps, challenges assumptions, pushes back against bad ideas, offers best-practices alternatives Mindset of configuration before code to maximize maintainability for clients. Synthesis: Able to interpret customer requirements definitions; able to create solid requirements definitions based on customer interviews High threshold for quality; turns in good product; able to create and follow solid test plans Serious player with years in Salesforce? Excited to work with a fast growing Salesforce Partner who will push you hard and help you grow? Let's talk. Please include, along with your resume, a cover letter describing why you were attracted to this posting and why you believe you are a good fit. Principals Only Please.

Computer Science, Software Engineering, MIS orequivalent work experience 2-3 years of Implementation, Design, and Configurationexperience within Salesforce is required Experience with Salesforce platform - Sales/Service cloud,Force.com, Administration/Configuration, Apex, Force.com APIs, data loads Basic understanding of the overall Architecture ofSalesforce platform Experience with Agile methodology Ability to work as part of a team to solve technicalproblems in varied political and geographic environments Ability to travel up to 25% Who We Are: TTEC is a pioneer in customerexperience, engagement and growth solutions. Our 40,000+ employees servecustomers in more than 80 countries and 50 languages across social, mobile, anddigital channels. We utilize a holistic approach, applying solutionsfrom our four customer experience segments-Consulting, Technology, Care andGrowth-to help companies provide an amazing experience to their customers,inspire customer loyalty, and grow their business. Our employees live by a setof customer-focused values that guide relationships with clients, theircustomers and each other. Our Customer Technology Servicessegment drives customer experience outcomes to small, medium and enterpriseclients by providing best in class Cloud and Premise Contact Center and UnifiedCommunications Solutions, and CRM, Multi-channel, Omni-channel and WFOServices. What We Offer: Variable incentive bonus plan, 401K company match, tuitionreimbursement Global career mobility, employee recognition programs,professional development State of the art technology which allows for seamless globalconnectivity Rich wellness program and health incentives TTEC requires all employees hired in the United States to successfully pass a background check and depending on location and client program a drug test, as a condition of employment. TeleTech is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

  • Get recommendations/referrals from clients


Job Description - Saleforce Consultant


The Hunley Group is a rapidly growing Salesforce Gold Cloud Alliance Partner based in Davidson, NC with an entirely virtual team spread across the country. We're an exciting, fast-moving consultancy that is customer-focused, highly collaborative, and values the contributions of our team. We have a reputation as both a great partner to our clients as well as a great place to work.


We are seeking an experienced Salesforce consultant to support us in the execution of client projects. You should be extremely comfortable and confident in knocking out Salesforce implementations. We would expect you to be able to take point with clients, driving discovery and analysis, constructing a strategy and proposed architecture, guiding the project overall, and managing/completing the agreed upon configuration (no Apex - will support with coders as needed). You will probably work on multiple projects with different clients simultaneously.


Responsibilities


  • You will serve as the senior process, strategy, and architectural lead on client projects. We and your clients will lean on you to lead:
  • Business analysis and discovery
  • Process design
  • Requirements definition, including writing org-level, complex implementation requirements that are easy for clients to understand and respond to
  • Project management and coordination - managing the schedule, managing the client's PM as well as the internal team
  • Instance configuration tasks
  • Integrations
  • Data migration and management
  • Testing and UAT
  • Training and launch
  • You will lead project teams, managing more junior consultants as needed. You'll use Hunley processes and help us develop them further
  • You will take the lead in managing the relationships with the client-side business leads
  • You will champion quality on projects, and identify and mitigate risks
  • You will manage budgets, ensuring that projects are within budget or getting client agreement to additional work


Qualifications


  • Minimum 5 years of experience functioning as a Salesforce consultant
  • Salesforce Certifications & experience
  • Required: Administrator and either Sales Cloud or Service Cloud
  • Other Cloud certifications a plus
  • Detailed knowledge of Salesforce architecture
  • Understanding of data and ability to manage data quality tools
  • You should have at least 6 new instance implementations under your belt, or a minimum of a dozen large-scale projects in existing instances. Your role should have been as the primary driver for many of these.
  • Bachelors degree required; MBA is a plus


Required Skills:


  • Good communication skills; able to speak to business users in "layman's language"
  • Critical thinker - spots gaps, challenges assumptions, pushes back against bad ideas, offers best-practices alternatives
  • Mindset of configuration before code to maximize maintainability for clients.
  • Synthesis: Able to interpret customer requirements definitions; able to create solid requirements definitions based on customer interviews
  • High threshold for quality; turns in good product; able to create and follow solid test plans


Serious player with years in Salesforce? Excited to work with a fast growing Salesforce Partner who will push you hard and help you grow? Let's talk.


Please include, along with your resume, a cover letter describing why you were attracted to this posting and why you believe you are a good fit.


Principals Only Please.

items.content:
Our North Atlanta client is seeking a Remote Salesforce Developer with specialization developing and deploying Salesforce apps. The role is part of the Platform Management & Innovation team, responsible for business ownership and flawless delivery of critical business systems (e.g., Salesforce, Encompass, others), new technologies, and data analytics projects that will help this mortgage company achieve long-term financial growth, expense control goals, and optimize the customer experience. Key goals are to experience savings through innovation and retiring of old technology, introducing automation and digitizing our lending workflow.


Responsibilities:

You will engage in full systems life cycle management (e.g., analysis, technical requirements, design, coding, testing, implementation) of systems and applications software to ensure delivery is on time and within budget. You will research and support the integration of emerging technologies and participate in component and data architecture design, technology planning, and testing for Applications Development initiatives to meet business requirements and ensure compliance. You will provide knowledge and support for application development, integration, and maintenance. You will work with business groups and technical teams to successfully design and manage solutions leveraging the full power of the Salesforce platform and integration with external systems.

The Salesforce Applications Developer has experience designing and deploying solutions using Force.com, Salesforce.com CRM, and other Salesforce related technologies.


Required Skills:

  • Bachelor's Degree in a technical discipline or related job experience. SFDC Certified professionals experience a significant plus.
  • 5+ years of software development experience with Salesforce.com (Apex, VisualForce, and Force.com applications).
  • At least 5 full lifecycle implementation of Salesforce.com CRM with custom Force.com apps.
  • At least 5 Sales Cloud and Service Cloud implementations platform that includes:
  1. Experience with the SFDC overall platform and all its modules and in Force.com designing technical solution architecture and integration.
  2. Experience in the architecture and design of 1 or more successful custom Salesforce.com solutions spanning multiple platforms, including integration, data migration, and authentication/Roles based access control.
  3. Deep understanding of APEX Classes, Lightning Components & Framework, Aura UI Framework, Triggers, Workflows, Validations.
  4. Deep understanding of Visual Force pages including HTML, JavaScript, & ExtJS
  • Detailed knowledge of:
  1. SFDC CRM application (Sales and Service Cloud) capabilities and constraints, mobile and web technologies: Java, HTML5 and ESB
  2. Integration and Data services architecture and techniques: SOAP, REST, JSON * Detailed knowledge of Security, Sharing, Profiles, and Roles
  • Strong expertise in at least three of the following areas is required:
  1. System Implementation, Change Enablement & User Adoption
  2. SalesForce Automation
  3. Service & Support
  4. Marketing Cloud
  5. Communities and Mobile
  6. Platform development
  • Experience in cross-system data integration (mapping data from multiple sources to another).
  • Ability to recommend and establish Salesforce best practices.
  • Ability to operate effectively in a fast-paced deadline-driven environment
  • Proven ability to prioritize and manage a substantial workload.
  • Team player, self-starter, and motivated with the ability to multi-task while meeting deadlines.
  • Excellent organizational, oral, written communication, and presentation skills with the ability to interact with technical and functional staff at all levels. Ability to work with business users to transform and develop requirements into design, implementation and business solutions.

Preferred Skills:

  • Experience working in a matrix organization structure.
  • Experience in Financial Services, with an emphasis in mortgage banking/lending.
  • Exposure to Business Process Re-engineering.

About Stratfield Consulting

  • We are very proud of the people that we invite into our firm and clients. Our people are:
  • Experienced- smart problem solvers.
  • Easy to work with- friendly, modest, and humble.
  • Earnest & Engaged- we care enough to do the extra work to ensure your success.

Full-time opportunity located in Atlanta. Our client is not able to offer relocation or visa sponsorships at this time.

APPLY NOW!

Please forward resume to:

Talent Acquisition Specialist

**Please, NO phone calls or third-party recruiting agency submittals or inquiries.

items.content:
This position can be Remote.


GENERAL DESCRIPTION

Symmetry™ is a leading applications management and hybrid cloud hosting provider. An SAP partner since 2005, Symmetry is certified in SAP Hosting, Cloud and SAP HANA® Operations. As a true extension of each customer's IT team, Symmetry places a laser focus the end user experience and offers highly flexible, tailored solutions to meet the unique business needs of global enterprise clients.


POSITION

The Symmetry Senior Basis Administrator is part of a Symmetry Consulting Team, participating in delivering contracted services to a set of Clients. The Senior Basis Administrator performs system monitoring of Client systems, regular system maintenance (escalation level), mentors and coaches, and performs project work as needed.

DUTIES

· Provide maintenance, problem handling and report preparation activities for clients

· Perform root cause analysis for clients' problems and provide accurate documentation to client in a timely and effective manner

· Establish technical knowledge in three or more technical areas outside of SAP ERP products

· Provide recommendations and guidance for the tuning and optimization SAP landscape

· Lead project deliverables on schedule and accurately

items.title: SAP SD Consultant - German Speaking - 100% Remote Working from Home -
items.content:
SAP SD Consultant - German Speaking - 100% Remote Working from Home! - Germany. Start Date: January 2020 (Flexible). Permanent Job. Salary up to €80,000/annum + Bonus + Benefits.

Our client is a specialist SAP Consulting partner who specialise in Cloud solutions. They are looking for an experienced SAP SD Consultant to join them. This is a great company to join as you will be working on the very latest cutting edge technologies working for a company who embrace modern working practices - in this role you can work 100% remotely from home!

Huge investments are being made into the Cloud, SaaS and mobile technologies. Our client is looking for resources with a clear understanding on the direction of IT into the cloud. They're looking for someone that has a broad SAP SD background who desires to integrate SAP SD processes into these emerging technologies.

The SAP SD Consultant will serve as a liaison between the client and our internal development team to provide E-commerce solutions enabled by SAP SD processes. The ideal candidate will be an experienced and certified SAP SD consultant. The candidate will map SAP SD solutions to web processes. You will be responsible for project management, integration testing and support. You will ensure the business requirements and E-commerce development goals are achieved.

This is a great opportunity to make the most of your consultancy and communication skills. Candidates need to be fully conversant with SAP implementations and projects in the SD space. The client seeks a good team player with strong planning and organizational skills who will work with client stakeholders and lead design sessions, focus groups and weekly status meetings.

Required Skills and Experience:

  • Several years of SAP SD experience
  • Experience in many full-life cycle implementations, cutovers, upgrades & support projects
  • Order to Cash (Sales Order, Delivery, Billing)
  • Must be able to read and debug ABAP code.
  • Strong Project Management insight on all phases of a Project Lifecycle, from Blueprints to Rollouts
  • Cross Module Integration and testing of SD with MM and FI

Your Project Management Experience should include:

  • Keep management apprised of progress & risks
  • Managing project issue/risks & escalation process
  • Managing Project Budget
  • Managing scope creep
  • Writing SOWs
  • Look for additional opportunities with the client
  • Project Management ticket management process

Nice to have:

  • B2C and B2B portals experience
  • Cloud experience

Languages:

  • Must be fluent in both German and English

Responsibilities include:

  • Map SAP SD business processes into E-commerce integrated solutions in SAP
  • Suggest implementing SAP SD Best Practices that enable order processing and tracking on the web
  • Make recommendations for SAP process improvements
  • Provide technical direction and guidance to project/delivery teams
  • Facilitate online web meetings and focus groups

Other responsibilities include:

  • This is a client-facing role with excellent verbal and written skills required
  • Experience leading teams
  • Desire to assist with pre-sales activities
  • Conduct technical project reviews
  • Mentor junior and other resources
  • Contribute to the company knowledge base
  • Excellent Management, Communication and Presentation skills
  • Experience interacting with a wide spectrum of management and technical contacts
  • Commitment to client satisfaction and staunch customer experience focus
  • Ability to operate across multiple projects concurrently and assume the responsibility for the successful implementation of projects

Related Keywords: SAP SD, SAP Sales & Distribution, Cloud, SAP OTC, SAP Order to Cash, SAP O2C, SD Sales Order, SD Delivery, SD Billing, SD Pricing, SAP Project Management, SAP Logistics, SAP Logistic, SAP Logistik

items.content:
Salesforce Apex Developer [REMOTE]

About this job

Job type: Full-time
Experience level: Mid-Level, Senior, Lead
Industry: Software Development
Company size: 51–200 people
Company type: Private
Company: Clevertech | No office location

Technologies

java
continuous-integration
salesforce
apex
java-ee

Job description

Clevertech is a leading consultancy that is on a mission to build transformational digital solutions for the world’s most innovative organizations. Enterprise companies turn to Clevertech to help them launch innovative digital products that interact with hundreds of millions of customers, transactions and data points. By partnering with Clevertech these companies are propelling forward and changing their industries, business models and more.

Based in New York City with fully remote development teams, Clevertech has built core product offerings for clients whose value was revealed in transactions valued in excess of $100 million.  

The problems we solve everyday are real and require creativity, grit and determination. We are building a culture that challenges norms while fostering experimentation and personal growth. We are hiring team members who are passionate and energized by the vision of empowering our customers in a complex industry through technology, data and a deep understanding of client concerns. In order to grasp the scale of problems we face, ideally you have some exposure to Logistics, FinTech, Transportation, Insurance, Media or other complex multifactor industries. 

What You’ll Do:

  • Collaborate in every stage of a product's lifecycle; from planning to delivery
  • Create clean, modern, testable, well-documented code
  • Agile process with CI/CD environment to develop scalable web applications 
  • Communicate daily with clients to understand and deliver technical requirements

What is Required:

  • 5+ years professional experience in a senior developer role with Java
    • Preferred:  critical software development in large enterprises
  • Experience with Integrated Salesforce and Force.com API with Java/Oracle
  • Knowledge of micro-services, networking, load balancing, and service discovery
  • Superior communication skills in English 
  • Strong understanding of the agile software development process
  • Coding standards to include unit, integration and acceptance testing
Apply now

About Clevertech

Clevertech is a leading consultancy that is on a mission to build transformational digital solutions for the world’s most innovative organizations. Enterprise companies turn to Clevertech to help them launch innovative digital products that interact with hundreds of millions of customers, transactions and data points. By partnering with Clevertech these companies are propelling forward and changing their industries, business models and more.

Based in New York City with fully remote development teams, Clevertech has built core product offerings for clients whose value was revealed in transactions valued in excess of $100 million.  

The problems we solve everyday are real and require creativity, grit and determination. We are building a culture that challenges norms while fostering experimentation and personal growth. We are hiring team members who are passionate and energized by the vision of empowering our customers in a complex industry through technology, data and a deep understanding of client concerns. In order to grasp the scale of problems we face, ideally you have some exposure to Logistics, FinTech, Transportation, Insurance, Media or other complex multifactor industries.

Our Benefits

We know that people do their best work when they’re taken care of. So we make sure to offer great benefits.

  • Competitive Vacation Package
  • Annual Financial Allowance for YOUR development
  • Flexible Family Leave
  • Clevertech Gives Back Program
  • Clevertech U (Leadership Program, Habit Building, New Skills Training)
  • Clevertech Swag
  • Strong Clevertech Community

How We Work

Why do people join Clevertech? To make an impact. To grow themselves. To be surrounded by developers who they can learn from. We are truly excited to be creating waves in an industry under transformation.

True innovation comes from an exchange of knowledge across all of our teams. To put people on the path for success, we nurture a culture built on trust, collaboration, and personal growth. You will work in small feature-based cross-functional teams and be empowered to take ownership.

We make a point of constantly evolving our experience and skills. We value diverse perspectives and fostering personal growth by challenging everyone to push beyond our comfort level and try something new.

The result? We produce meaningful work

Getting Hired

We hire people from a variety of backgrounds who are respectful, collaborative, and introspective. Members of the tech team, for example, come from diverse backgrounds having worked as copy editors, graphic designers, and photographers prior to joining Clevertech.

Our hiring process focuses not only on your skills but also on your professional and personal ambitions. We want to get to know you. We put a lot of thought into the interview process in order to get a holistic understanding of you while being mindful of your time. You will solve problems derived from the work we do on a daily basis followed by thoughtful discussions around potential fit. Whatever the outcome, we want you to have a great candidate experience.

Want to learn more about Clevertech and the team? Check out clevertech.careers and our video highlighting Clevertech's Culture

Benefits

  • Full-Time Telecommuting
  • Flexible Schedules
  • Paid Time Off
  • Ability to Work with Cutting-Edge Technology
  • Opportunity to Work with and Learn from Top Developers
  • Contribute to Open Source
  • Flexible Family Leave
  • E-Reader for Trainings, Book Club, & Book Recommendations
  • Annual Personal Development Stipend

items.title: Freelance Salesforce Consultant (Remote)
items.content: Mission The mission for Salesforce consultants is to understand client strategy and capture business requirements on projects (guided by a partner if relevant for vertical), articulate and execute business requirements with help from other parts of the organization, and make sure they're executed competently. Keep the client happy, communicate progress and budget with Hunley partners to keep them up to date, and manage/advise need for resources Outcomes Understand client's business needs - be business analyst for each project Listen to client, articulate their needs, and understand their underlying needs even if they're different from the words they use Translate business needs into business requirements, process design, requirements definition Have clients comfortable with how the project is coming along - communication, no surprises Have Hunley partners comfortable with how the project is coming along - communication, no surprises Manage and/or execute on business analysis, process design, requirements definition, configuration/code, data migration, integrations, testing, training Manage and advise need for resources for projects, delegating where appropriate Run and complete profitable projects Get recommendations/referrals from clients Job Description - Saleforce Consultant The Hunley Group is a rapidly growing Salesforce Gold Cloud Alliance Partner based in Davidson, NC with an entirely virtual team spread across the country. We're an exciting, fast-moving consultancy that is customer-focused, highly collaborative, and values the contributions of our team. We have a reputation as both a great partner to our clients as well as a great place to work. We are seeking an experienced Salesforce consultant to support us in the execution of client projects. You should be extremely comfortable and confident in knocking out Salesforce implementations. We would expect you to be able to take point with clients, driving discovery and analysis, constructing a strategy and proposed architecture, guiding the project overall, and managing/completing the agreed upon configuration (no Apex - will support with coders as needed). You will probably work on multiple projects with different clients simultaneously. Responsibilities You will serve as the senior process, strategy, and architectural lead on client projects. We and your clients will lean on you to lead: Business analysis and discovery Process design Requirements definition, including writing org-level, complex implementation requirements that are easy for clients to understand and respond to Project management and coordination - managing the schedule, managing the client's PM as well as the internal team Instance configuration tasks Integrations Data migration and management Testing and UAT Training and launch You will lead project teams, managing more junior consultants as needed. You'll use Hunley processes and help us develop them further You will take the lead in managing the relationships with the client-side business leads You will champion quality on projects, and identify and mitigate risks You will manage budgets, ensuring that projects are within budget or getting client agreement to additional work Qualifications Minimum 5 years of experience functioning as a Salesforce consultant Salesforce Certifications & experience Required: Administrator and either Sales Cloud or Service Cloud Other Cloud certifications a plus Detailed knowledge of Salesforce architecture Understanding of data and ability to manage data quality tools You should have at least 6 new instance implementations under your belt, or a minimum of a dozen large-scale projects in existing instances. Your role should have been as the primary driver for many of these. Bachelors degree required; MBA is a plus Required Skills: Good communication skills; able to speak to business users in "layman's language" Critical thinker - spots gaps, challenges assumptions, pushes back against bad ideas, offers best-practices alternatives Mindset of configuration before code to maximize maintainability for clients. Synthesis: Able to interpret customer requirements definitions; able to create solid requirements definitions based on customer interviews High threshold for quality; turns in good product; able to create and follow solid test plans Serious player with years in Salesforce? Excited to work with a fast growing Salesforce Partner who will push you hard and help you grow? Let's talk. Please include, along with your resume, a cover letter describing why you were attracted to this posting and why you believe you are a good fit. Principals Only Please.

We have intentionally cultivated steady growth focused on being approachable and helpful to our dearly valued clients and closely cared-for employees. M&S people simply â€œcare hardâ€, and this reflects in our work products, our interactions, and our culture.

Role Overview:

The Salesforce Developer is a pivotal role in our Salesforce practice in order to work with our clients to achieve their strategic goals. This role will require you to apply your experience to deliver acute development excellence by way of advisory services, consulting and hands-on execution, across Salesforce's suite of products both current and future.

The Salesforce Developer will work directly with clients throughout the development lifecycle - design, program, test, deploy, enhance and support/maintenance of Salesforce.com solutions needed by our clients. The ideal candidate for this role would be comfortable working within the Salesforce framework and able to troubleshoot and problem solve quickly with a strong sense of urgency, attentive to detail and committed to testing, and able to communicate well with business partners. Additionally, this role would actively participate and contribute in solution estimating and planning in collaboration with other M&S Consulting roles. The role has a strong focus on people interaction, and your own personal and professional growth.

Required Skills:

This particular project has a restriction to US Citizens only.5 Years of experience with Visualforce and implementing these into internal salesforce and communities5 Years of experience with Apex CodeExperience with CommunitiesExperience with Lightning Framework and event based web frameworksExperience with Javascript and JQueryExperience integrating apex with external web services using SOAP and REST based communicationExperience with modifying apex code in a salesforce organization with a large Apex code base. Specifically, following existing code base design patterns to best fit a solution.Experience with Agile/Scrum based development approaches.Responsible for ensuring our CRM delivery services satisfy, and advance our client's needs and objectives while adhering to the highest standards and best practices.

Preferred Skills:

Expertise with Salesforce.com and a strong background with implementation, development, and administration.The client wishes to enhance an existing application that is not in production and place it into production and optimize the usage of the Salesforce platform to drive maximum value from our Salesforce investment.Strong Salesforce development skills. Salesforce solution development experience to include configuring Salesforce, working with Salesforce API's and developing customizations (i.e. using Apex). Experience working with the various Salesforce environments (e.g. promoting code from the sandbox to production). Good understanding of the various Salesforce licenses, communities and best practices for Salesforce development.Broad based experience in designing, prototyping, and building custom data centric web-based applications in MS, DB2 and Oracle based client/server environments.Work with business users on helping to develop requirements and functionality that is desired by the business, so excellent communication skills are a must.

Position is for anywhere in the United States

How We Work

Why do people join Clevertech? To make an impact. To grow themselves. To be surrounded by developers who they can learn from. We are truly excited to be creating waves in an industry under transformation.

True innovation comes from an exchange of knowledge across all of our teams. To put people on the path for success, we nurture a culture built on trust, collaboration, and personal growth. You will work in small feature-based cross-functional teams and be empowered to take ownership.

We make a point of constantly evolving our experience and skills. We value diverse perspectives and fostering personal growth by challenging everyone to push beyond our comfort level and try something new.

The result? We produce meaningful work

Getting Hired

We hire people from a variety of backgrounds who are respectful, collaborative, and introspective. Members of the tech team, for example, come from diverse backgrounds having worked as copy editors, graphic designers, and photographers prior to joining Clevertech.

Our hiring process focuses not only on your skills but also on your professional and personal ambitions. We want to get to know you. We put a lot of thought into the interview process in order to get a holistic understanding of you while being mindful of your time. You will solve problems derived from the work we do on a daily basis followed by thoughtful discussions around potential fit. Whatever the outcome, we want you to have a great candidate experience.

items.title: Salesforce/Vlocity Developer (virtual remote home office eligible)
items.content:
Description

The Senior Software Engineer codes software applications based on business requirements. The Senior Software Engineer work assignments involve moderately complex to complex issues where the analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors.

Responsibilities

  • The Salesforce Senior Software Engineer codes Salesforce Sales Cloud assignments based on business requirements. The Senior Software Engineer work assignments involve moderately complex to complex issues where the analysis of situations or data requires an in-depth evaluation of variable factors.

The Salesforce Senior Software Engineer will support the application development for the migration of legacy capabilities into the Salesforce Sales Cloud utilizing Lightning components. This developer will be working with the Vlocity application in addition to Sales Cloud to satisfy business requirements in an agile fashion. The developer will also be responsible for helping to maintain and advance our CI/CD pipeline utilizing tool such as Azure Devops, AutoRabbit, Jenkins, Heroku/Grax, etc. This developer will be working in an agile work environment with business users, the ideal candidate is receptive to collaborative work environments.

The Senior Software Engineer standardizes the quality assurance procedure for software. Oversees testing and debugging and develops fixes. Researches complaints and makes necessary adjustments and/or recommendations to resolve complex software related issues. Begins to influence department's strategy. Makes decisions on moderately complex to complex issues regarding technical approach for project components, and work is performed without direction. Exercises considerable latitude in determining objectives and approaches to assignments.

  • Required Qualifications

    o Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or 5+ years in related experience

    o Five+ years of Salesforce Sales Cloud experience

    o Five+ years of experience designing, developing, and testing of software applications and/or infrastructure

    o 1+ years demonstrated experience with Lightning Component Framework and Aura Framework

    o Excellent communications

    Preferred Qualifications

    o Master's Degree

    o Demonstrated experience with Vlocity Application

    o Salesforce Certified Sales Cloud Consultant

    • Salesforce Certified Platform App Builder
    • Experience with Health Care Industry

Scheduled Weekly Hours

40

items.content: Join Our Team! We are Plus+, for 20 years, our company has believed in the transformative power of information to help people and businesses thrive. We empower our clients by focusing on their business objectives in order to deliver appropriate holistic technology solutions, bridging the gap between business and technology. Our Culture is dynamic! We are committed to being a "People First" organization and we strongly believe that the success of our team also empowers our organization to excel as a whole. Plus+ is consistently recognized as a "Best Workplace" by Pittsburgh Post-Gazette, has been featured as one of "Pittsburgh's Coolest Offices" by Biz Journal and was also a finalist for "Culture Leader of the Year" by the Pittsburgh Technology Council. Our fun and collaborative culture encourages our people to do their best work every day and we strive to recognize individuals on their strengths by providing opportunities for growth, including certifications and continuing education. We take pride in enabling our people to make decisions daily that contribute to their career, wellness & confidence. What's Your Role: Plus is seeking a Senior Consultant/Developer, that will contribute to identifying, communicating, and solving highly visible business practices, processes, and technology issues for our clients. The Senior Consultant/Developer will participate in delivering business solutions in a team oriented, collaborative environment. The focus of the senior consultant is to participate in design, solution architecture, technical architecture, and development and implementation efforts of business solutions. How You'll Contribute: Provides consulting services Guides clients and team members to resolve requirements of varying complexity Determines implementation options using best practices approach Architects technical solutions to the appropriate needs of the client, based on Salesforce platform and client IT environment, both internally and cloud based Analyzes client data requirements and interprets into migration and/or integration transformation specifications Develops, unit tests and modifies Apex code using structured methodology Develops and deploys solutions that meet client requirements in a scalable and repeatable manner Provides clear and concise estimates to sales and delivery teams Communicates clearly and consistently Provides ongoing communication to team members, management and clients Communicates with clients to provide updates on inquiries across projects and support initiatives Participates in team meetings and updates internal systems in a timely manner Meets professional standards Develops quality deliverables and provides guidance to others on deliverables Adheres to project deadlines and commitments Exceeds customer expectations of professionalism Strives to remain technically proficient in technology innovations Acts as a client advocate Understands business value in solutions Balances client requirements against competing efforts and project risk factors What's Needed for Success (Skills/Experience/Education) Required Skills: Experience with custom development using the Force.com platform including Apex, Visualforce, SOQL and SOSL Experience with Java, C#, C++, .NET or other related languages, and experience with developing enterprise applications Experience with relevant scripting, mark-up & styling languages (JavaScript, HTML, XML, CSS, etc.) Proficiency in Salesforce.com declarative configuration Skilled at analyzing, troubleshooting and solving problems Experience with development methodologies and concepts Understanding of enterprise solution architecture as it pertains to scalability, systems integration, etc. Extensive experience with relevant IDEs, deployment methodologies, and system testing Demonstrated ability to learn quickly in a rapid-paced environment Excellent bidirectional verbal and written communication skills Experience using common business applications (Microsoft Office Suite) Strong desire to learn new industries and technologies Ability to adapt to new challenges Ability to prioritize tasks, work on multiple assignments, and manage ambiguity Ability to work both independently and as a part of a team with professionals at all levels Preferred Skills: Salesforce.com certification (Platform Developer) Experience working with modern MV* JavaScript frameworks (Angular, Backbone, Ember) Understanding of web design and related web services (particularly REST and SOAP) Required Experience: 3+ years working as a business consultant or technical liaison in an internal or external capacity 2+ years leading CRM system implementation efforts using an SDLC methodology Education: Bachelors of Science or Bachelors of Arts degree (Computer Science, Engineering or MIS preferred) Relevant product & technology certifications Learn more about our Careers:

We offer a flexible vacation policy, 401K enrollment, and the ability to participate in our health insurance plan. Our fun and collaborative culture encourages our people to do their best work every day and we strive to recognize individuals on their strengths by providing opportunities for growth, including certifications and continuing education. We take pride in enabling our people to make decisions daily that contribute to their career, wellness & confidence. What's Your Role: Plus is seeking a Senior Consultant/Developer, that will contribute to identifying, communicating, and solving highly visible business practices, processes, and technology issues for our clients. The Senior Consultant/Developer will participate in delivering business solutions in a team oriented, collaborative environment. The focus of the senior consultant is to participate in design, solution architecture, technical architecture, and development and implementation efforts of business solutions. How You'll Contribute: Provides consulting services Guides clients and team members to resolve requirements of varying complexity Determines implementation options using best practices approach Architects technical solutions to the appropriate needs of the client, based on Salesforce platform and client IT environment, both internally and cloud based Analyzes client data requirements and interprets into migration and/or integration transformation specifications Develops, unit tests and modifies Apex code using structured methodology Develops and deploys solutions that meet client requirements in a scalable and repeatable manner Provides clear and concise estimates to sales and delivery teams Communicates clearly and consistently Provides ongoing communication to team members, management and clients Communicates with clients to provide updates on inquiries across projects and support initiatives Participates in team meetings and updates internal systems in a timely manner Meets professional standards Develops quality deliverables and provides guidance to others on deliverables Adheres to project deadlines and commitments Exceeds customer expectations of professionalism Strives to remain technically proficient in technology innovations Acts as a client advocate Understands business value in solutions Balances client requirements against competing efforts and project risk factors What's Needed for Success (Skills/Experience/Education) Required Skills: Experience with custom development using the Force.com platform including Apex, Visualforce, SOQL and SOSL Experience with Java, C#, C++, .NET or other related languages, and experience with developing enterprise applications Experience with relevant scripting, mark-up & styling languages (JavaScript, HTML, XML, CSS, etc.) Proficiency in Salesforce.com declarative configuration Skilled at analyzing, troubleshooting and solving problems Experience with development methodologies and concepts Understanding of enterprise solution architecture as it pertains to scalability, systems integration, etc. Extensive experience with relevant IDEs, deployment methodologies, and system testing Demonstrated ability to learn quickly in a rapid-paced environment Excellent bidirectional verbal and written communication skills Experience using common business applications (Microsoft Office Suite) Strong desire to learn new industries and technologies Ability to adapt to new challenges Ability to prioritize tasks, work on multiple assignments, and manage ambiguity Ability to work both independently and as a part of a team with professionals at all levels Preferred Skills: Salesforce.com certification (Platform Developer) Experience working with modern MV* JavaScript frameworks (Angular, Backbone, Ember) Understanding of web design and related web services (particularly REST and SOAP) Required Experience: 3+ years working as a business consultant or technical liaison in an internal or external capacity 2+ years leading CRM system implementation efforts using an SDLC methodology Education: Bachelors of Science or Bachelors of Arts degree (Computer Science, Engineering or MIS preferred) Relevant product & technology certifications Learn more about our Careers:

items.title: SAP FRE (F&R) Support - Remote
items.content:
Location - Remote Duration - ad-hoc hours (ongoing) est 5-80hrs a month Start - ASAP Mako Professionals is a leading IT solutions provider across the United States. Mako works directly with their clients, and this is a current customer that is a support/msp provider. This position is looking for a SAP consultant with strong experience within SAP FRE module, and be able to handle support tickets on an ad-hoc basis. This role is 100% remote and work can be performed after business hours. Clear communication would be required as their may be times needing to speak with the end customer to resolve the tickets. Musts SAP Support SAP FRE / F&R -Forecasting and Replenishment module (S4) - provided by Dice

SAP, SAP Consultant
